metadata.synopsis: A fugitive threatens the solidarity of some Tokyo prostitutes who have banded together for survival in postwar Japan.

reviews: Softcore porn exploitation continually spiked by Suzuki's political vehemence and bottomless bag of visual slaps
An eye-poppingly colorful story of the feral, backstabbing existence that cropped up just after World War II in Japan.
Visually more engaging than is the lurid pulp story.
shocking and disturbing, and one can only imagine how 1960s audiences reacted to it
